// Generic surCO surCO: Solar Urban Resource Collaboration Username Password Log In Log out Register About Help Help icon Open menu Close menu Upload saved sessions Logo NaN ° -° ∠%1$s° Delete Item deleted Share Stop session Start session Yes No // Login view Log In to start sharing your solar resource data! Don\'t have an account? // Welcome view Start sharing measurements Welcome to \nVIPV Acquisition Program! // Permissions view Required permissions The following permissions are required to use this app. You will have access to the app once all permissions are granted: View permissions in system settings Location Location in background Bluetooth access Push notifications Grant Disable battery optimization // Settings view Settings Behaviour When sessions will be uploaded Self-hosting zone Address http:// or https:// Port User access token Token to post data to server Test API endpoint Endpoint is reachable Could not reach endpoint Probing connection with server… Color theme
System default
Light

Automatically when session ends
Automatically on WiFi and un-metered networks
Manually upload session files
Bluetooth Scan Interval Must be a natural number Milliseconds Manage saved session files Open battery optimization settings Confirm action This will log you out and your personal data will be shared to another endpoint. Privacy Policy and other legal claims won\'t apply. // About view Version: %1$s (%2$d) App developed by the ISI-IES research group at Universidad Politécnica de Madrid. To get in contact with us, to provide feedback, or ask for deletion or modification of your data, use any of the methods referenced at the bottom.\nThis application shares GPS location, phone orientation, Bluetooth beacon measurements, model and manufacturer of the phone, and Android version to a web server when a user is logged in and somewhere in time when a session has ended.\nData collected will be used for scientific purposes and won\'t be shared with third parties under no circumstance, except if it asked by the same user or the legal authorities. Website GitHub Email [surCO]: App Inquiry // Home view No beacons detected Nearby beacons: %1$d Monitoring is disabled Last read: Click to add missing required info fields. Unknown position Delete all data? This action can\'t be undone. Session cleared Sessions uploaded Could not upload sessions Cannot export an empty session Uploading saved sessions… No past sessions pending for upload Measurement session has started Measurement session has ended Delete current session Share current session Low Compass Precision Please move your phone gently in circles to recalibrate the compass. You must log in to your account first. Time to Update! The server recommends to update.\nYou may find new super features in the latest version!\nYou can still log in and upload sessions. Obsolete version Please update the app.\nThis application version is not allowed by the server.\nYou can\'t log in. // Beacon details view Beacon details Optional beacon description Tilt Direction

OK Username Repeat password This email is already registered Register here User logged out Passwords don\'t match // Notification strings Ongoing Acquisition Sessions Notifies when a measurements session is active. Acquisition session underway Beacon monitoring is active. Stop Bluetooth or Location disabled. Notifies Bluetooth or Location should be enabled. Connectivity Issue Bluetooth and Location disabled. Location disabled. Bluetooth disabled. // Misc Prefer taking measurements for yourself? You can use the app without an account, but you won\'t be able to upload data for scientific research.
